block.p: McCARRON-Robert. On July 1, 2000. Owner of M Comm Creative Resources, Inc. Devoted husband of the late Mary. Loving father of Anthony. Dear brother of Leonard ''Butch.'' Cherished uncle of Doreen McCarron. Friends may call Wednesday only, 9-10:30 AM, at Andrett Funeral Home, 353 Second Ave (at 20th St.), NYC. Mass of Christian Burial Wednesday, 11 AM, at Epiphany R.C. Church. Interment St. Raymond's Cemetery.
